original_text: The Lord answered Moses, “Go out in front of the people. Take with you some of the elders of Israel and take in your hand the staff with which you struck the Nile, and go.
korean_text: 여호와께서 모세에게 이르시되 백성 앞을 지나서 이스라엘 장로들을 데리고 나일 강을 치던 네 지팡이를 손에 잡고 가라

sentences.original_text: Go out in front of the people
Take with you some of the elders of Israel
sentences.korean_translation: 이스라엘 장로 몇 사람을 데리고 가라

sentences.original_text: Take in your hand the staff
with which you struck the Nile
sentences.korean_translation: 네가 나일 강을 쳤던 그 지팡이를
